case_1: I am unable to access external storage files after switching from the main user to a guest user. Please tell me which log range I should check to debug this storage permission issue.
case_2: The arm64 emulator never finishes booting and keeps showing the boot animation indefinitely. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this boot loop.
case_3: When I start the emulator, it shows the Google logo but then immediately reboots, repeating this cycle. Please tell me which log range I should check to debug this boot failure.
case_4: The device performed a soft reboot unexpectedly, and the UI restarted while I was using the device. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this system_server crash.
case_5: Apps are failing to launch and crashing immediately. It seems like the main process for forking apps has terminated. Please tell me which log range I should check to debug this Zygote crash.
case_6: Audio playback cuts out intermittently, and I suspect the audio service is restarting in the background. Please let me know which log ranges I should check to troubleshoot this audio issue.
case_7: Background tasks scheduled with WorkManager are not executing after the device wakes up from doze mode. Please tell me which log range I should check to debug this task execution failure.
case_8: The application crashes immediately when attempting to transfer a large amount of data to another activity. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this IPC crash.
case_9: The screen flickers black momentarily and the UI redraws, suggesting the display rendering service might have crashed. Please tell me which log range I should check to debug this SurfaceFlinger issue.
case_10: Bluetooth audio stopped working entirely while changing codec settings, and the settings UI has become unresponsive. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this Bluetooth freeze.
case_11: The Settings application is completely frozen and not responding to any touch inputs, eventually showing an ANR dialog. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this Application Not Responding issue.
case_12: Audio playback is stuttering severely with noticeable frame drops, and eventually the audio service crashes. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this audio performance and crash issue.
case_13: The system server crashes repeatedly with signs of memory exhaustion after using media applications for a while. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this potential native memory leak.
case_14: The system crashes or reboots whenever I try to install or update multiple apps simultaneously. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this package installation failure.
case_15: Multiple apps and system processes are crashing randomly during heavy usage involving inter-process communication. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this IPC instability.
case_16: The system becomes sluggish and slow to respond after using permission-related features for a long time. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this performance degradation.
case_17: The UI rendering crashes, causing a soft reboot. It seems to happen consistently during complex graphical operations. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this graphics crash.
case_18: Network connectivity is completely lost. I cannot access any websites, and it seems DNS resolution is failing continuously. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this network connectivity issue.
case_19: VoLTE calls fail to connect, and the IMS service seems to crash and restart during the call attempt. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this call setup failure.
case_20: The system performance is degrading over time, eventually crashing with an OOM error after switching activities frequently. Please tell me which log range I should check for debugging this memory issue.
